ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Add shiny inputs with one or more inline buttons that grow and shrink with inputs. Also add tool tips to input buttons and styling and messages for input validation.
Add shiny inputs with one or more inline buttons that grow and shrink with inputs. Also add tool tips to input buttons and styling and messages for input validation.

name: r-shinypanel
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-shinypanel
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/shinypanel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/shinypanel/shinypanel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3264a5a75a306881e6a1622413298d7f3cda3dc78f54446171925774bab97a00

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-shiny
    - r-shinybs
    - r-shinyjs
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-shiny
    - r-shinybs
    - r-shinyjs

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('shinypanel')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('shinypanel')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=shinypanel
  license: MIT
  summary: Add shiny inputs with one or more inline buttons that grow and shrink with inputs. Also add tool tips to input buttons and styling and messages for input validation.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: shinypanel
# Type: Package
# Title: Shiny Control Panel
# Version: 0.1.4
# Author: Alex Pickering
# Maintainer: Alex Pickering <alexvpickering@gmail.com>
# Description: Add shiny inputs with one or more inline buttons that grow and shrink with inputs. Also add tool tips to input buttons and styling and messages for input validation.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
# Imports: shinyjs, shiny, shinyBS, htmltools, jsonlite
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2021-01-06 23:47:09 UTC; alex
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2021-01-07 06:30:02 UTC
